card.title: Least likely to vote the same

info.lead: List of 5 MPs who most often vote differently than the "vote of the parliamentary group". MPs are ranked in a descending order. The higher the value, the lower the commonalities between the two MPs.
text: We calculate the Euclidean distance between the results of a parliamentary group's voting and everyone else's voting (votes are converted to numerical values between -1 and 1).
We calculate the "distance" between all the MPs, rank them based on results and show the top 5.
